channel.title: Humor on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Humor on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Onion CEO Ben Collins Hasn't Given Up on Print—or Buying Infowars
item.description: A year after relaunching The Onion as a newspaper, Collins visits Uncanny Valley to talk about why “going into something and not ruining it is bravery.”
